comments:

Here are some more stack traces.  It seems to me that ajdt is expecting classes from Eclipse 3.1M3 or earlier that no longer exist in M4.

Hi Andrew,
Give us a chance, M4 has only been out a day :)
In fact we have been working with eclipse integration builds since M3, and the AJDT code in CVS HEAD is very close to working with M4, so you can expect a new dev build within the next few days.

Well, you guys are doing a great job.  I am really looking forward to the next release.  Thanks for all the work.

--a
A dev build for 3.2M4 is now available from the AJDT downloads page.
